Text: I downloaded the comic but its saying I don't have the program to open it... Can you please tell me what program I need to open the comic!!

Is this the only cbr/cbz file that isn't working for you, or is this just the first comic book(s) you've downloaded?

I'm asking because I need to know that the file is working correctly.

You need a comic book reader, such as CDisplay or GonVisor.
